SexLab Dependent Function Library


Devious Devices:
==============

dd_unlockall: Attempts to unlock all devices locked on the actor
	- parameter 1: Form: actor: target Actor
	- parameter 2: string: force: "force" to force an unlock, anything else otherwise

	Example
		dd_unlockall $self force

	Will attempt to (forcibly if necessary, e.g. quest locked items) unlock all lockable items on targeted actor.

-=-

dd_unlockslot: Attempts to unlock any device in the specified slot
	- parameter 1: Form: actor: target Actor
	- parameter 2: int: armorslot: int value armor slot e.g. 32 is body armor
	- parameter 3: string: force: "force" to force an unlock, anything else otherwise

	Example
		dd_unlockslot $self 32 force

	Should remove anything in body slot e.g. corset, harness, etc., and forced, so including quest items (be careful!)

-=-


Devious Followers:
==============

df_resetall: Resets all Devious Followers values (i.e. quest states, deal states, boredom, debt)
back to values as if having just started out.

	Example
		df_resetall

	Should be free of all debts, deals, and rules

-=-

df_setdebt: Sets current debt to the specified amount

	Example
		df_setdebt 0

	We all know what you are going to use it for

-=-


SexLab Aroused/OSLAroused:
==============

sla_get_actor_days_since_last_orgasm: Returns: float: the days since the actor last had an orgasm as a float

	Example
		sla_get_actor_days_since_last_orgasm $system.self

-=-

sla_get_arousal: Returns: int: the current arousal of the actor as an int

	Example
		sla_get_arousal

-=-

sla_get_exposure: Returns: int: the current exposure level of the actor as an int

	Example
		sla_get_exposure $system.self

-=-

sla_get_version: Returns: int: the version of SexLabAroused or OSLAroused

	Example
		sla_get_version
		msg_console "Version is: " $$

-=-

sla_send_exposure_event: Sends the "slaUpdateExposure" modevent. No return value.
	- parameter 1: Form: actor: target Actor
	- parameter 2: float: exposureAmount: amount of exposure update to send

	Example
		sla_send_exposure_event $system.self 5.0

-=-

sla_set_exposure: Sets the exposure for the target actor and returns the new amount as an int
	- parameter 1: Form: actor: target Actor
	- parameter 2: int: exposureAmount: amount of exposure update to set

	Example
		sla_set_exposure $system.self 25

-=-

sla_update_exposure: Updates the exposure for the target actor and returns the updated amount as an int.
This uses the API, not a modevent directly (though the API may still be sending a modevent behind the scenes)
	- parameter 1: Form: actor: target Actor
	- parameter 2: int: exposureAmount: amount of exposure update to apply

	Example
		sla_update_exposure $system.self 5

-=-
